morningBrief.headline: The Forecast Looks Promising
morningBrief.body: The rundown: 111 trails open, 56 groomed. Windy with temps around 38°. The whole mountain is basically open. Go explore. Watch for crowds at Sky, which saw 13-minute waits yesterday.

recommendations: Fresh corduroy on Crosscut - challenging for advanced skiers
Fresh corduroy on Drifter Connector - perfect for intermediate skiers
Fresh corduroy on Burnout - challenging for advanced skiers

morningBrief.headline: Fresh Snow on the Way
morningBrief.body: 98/103 trails spinning, 49 freshly groomed. 48° and Partly Cloudy. Peak terrain status: almost everything is available today. Heads up: Tahoe Zephyr Express peaked at 16 minutes yesterday. Consider alternatives.

morningBrief.headline: Storm Cycle Building
morningBrief.body: 110 trails open, 42 groomed. Mostly Clear, high of 42°. Nearly full mountain access with 110 of 113 trails spinning. Watch for crowds at #7 TC Express, which saw 9-minute waits yesterday.

recommendations: Fresh corduroy on Crest Trail - perfect for intermediate skiers

morningBrief.headline: 8 New Trails Today
morningBrief.body: A light refresh of 2" overnight makes the groomers smoother. New terrain alert: 8 trails added to the mix. Light snow possible in the forecast.

today.description: A mix of sun and cloud.

outlook.description: Cloudy with sunny periods and isolated flurries.

recommendations: Fresh corduroy on Rock & Roll - Lower - perfect for intermediate skiers
Fresh corduroy on Bean Sprout - perfect for intermediate skiers
Fresh corduroy on Emerald Forest - Upper Entrance - perfect for intermediate skiers
Whistler Village Gondola - Upper had longest waits (14.4 min avg) - consider alternatives

morningBrief.headline: Mixed Precip Today
morningBrief.body: The mountain got a nice 5" boost overnight. Conditions are improved. Heads up: Whistler Village Gondola - Upper peaked at 40 minutes yesterday. Consider alternatives. It's going to be a mixed bag today. Expect rain below and snow above.

recommendations: Fresh corduroy on Duck Soup - all skill levels
Fresh corduroy on Spillway - all skill levels
Fresh corduroy on Free Fall - all skill levels

morningBrief.headline: The Mountain Got a Boost
morningBrief.body: 3" of new snow. Not a powder day, but definitely an upgrade. 1 new trail opened today. Light snow possible in the forecast.

morningBrief.headline: Big Snow Incoming
morningBrief.body: 213 trails open, 87 groomed. Windy, temperatures TBD. Big things coming. 7" in the forecast. Might be time to plan ahead.

recommendations: Fresh corduroy on Keno - all skill levels
Fresh corduroy on Perseverance - all skill levels

morningBrief.headline: Winter's Coming Back
morningBrief.body: 180/191 trails spinning, 107 freshly groomed. Mostly Cloudy. Storm cycle alert! 11" on the way. Conditions are about to level up.

morningBrief.headline: Big Snow Incoming
morningBrief.body: 44/44 trails spinning, 14 freshly groomed. Mostly Cloudy. 1 new trail opened today. Big things coming. 9" in the forecast. Might be time to plan ahead.

morningBrief.headline: The Mountain Got a Boost
morningBrief.body: 3" of new snow. Not a powder day, but definitely an upgrade.

morningBrief.headline: A Little Sugar on Top
morningBrief.body: A light refresh of 2" overnight makes the groomers smoother. The forecast is flirting with us: light snow expected. Not a dump, but welcome.

morningBrief.headline: 1" Freshened Things Up
morningBrief.body: The mountain got a nice 1" touch-up. Expect improved conditions. Peak terrain status: almost everything is available today. The forecast is flirting with us: light snow expected. Not a dump, but welcome.

headlineSelection.previousHeadline: It's Gonna Be a Cold One

morningBrief.headline: Peak Terrain
morningBrief.body: Steady snowfall with 6" over the last week. The whole mountain is basically open. Go explore. Light snow possible in the forecast.

morningBrief.headline: The Forecast Looks Loaded
morningBrief.body: 1" fell while you were sleeping. The bumps are softer, groomers are primo. Big things coming. 6" in the forecast. Might be time to plan ahead.

morningBrief.headline: Winter's Coming Back
morningBrief.body: 1" fell while you were sleeping. The bumps are softer, groomers are primo. The weather models are locked in: 8" of snow heading our way.

morningBrief.headline: Major System Approaching
morningBrief.body: The mountain got a nice 1" touch-up. Expect improved conditions. Nearly full mountain access with 85 of 85 trails spinning. The weather models are locked in: 8" of snow heading our way.
